item.description:
This month we're being hosted at Black Duck Software, the leading provider of products and services for automating the management and use of open source software in multi-source development.

Black Duck has recently become interested in the Ruby/Rails community and would like to host an evening to share what their ideas are and hopefully meet developers interested in working within their space. Yes, there is potentially some very cool jobs here. Wear your nice shoes! ;)

*Edit* More info:

Directions:
Coming from I-95 south, take exit 27B, take a right and follow Winter St, turn left to stay on Winter St (right before Totten Pond Road), drive 0.3 miles and 265 Winter St would be on your right.

Coming from I-95 north, take exit 27A towards Totten Pond Rd, merge into Winter St, turn left to stay on Winter St, take 1st right to stay on Winter St, drive 0.3 miles and 265 Winter St would be on your right.

Room:
Eclipse Room (we'll put a sign outside). We'll have projector setup.

Food:
There will be Pizza.

See you there!
item.name: MetroWest Meetup Continues - October...New Venue With Food!!
